description: Rewrite a TrueSignal rule into its most compact, enforceable, and behaviorally specific form.

preconditions.description: The rule must meet all validity criteria before it can be optimized.

steps.description: Rewrite the rule to be more compact, enforceable, and behaviorally specific.
Eliminate unnecessary repetition and filler from the rule text.
Simplify language to enhance clarity and enforceability, following the TrueSignal standards.
Ensure that the optimized rule still adheres to TrueSignal's structural and behavioral standards.

output.description: The output consists of the optimized rule and a detailed summary of changes made.
